summary: The name really says it all.
descriptionHtml: I've also added a better description seeing as lycans and vampires are also effected by the silver sword. Previous mods of a similar nature often have the description disappear. If this is a bug or a chosen design idea I'm not sure but i've left the description in. Construction is the same as steel sword and steel greatsword but silver replaces the steel ingots.
author: Timoz
